sentences.en: For all the hullabaloo, though, these flights marked only an incremental advance.
sentences.cn: 然而, 虽然动静如此之大, 这些航班也只是标志着更进一步而已.

sentences.en: I was scared by the hullabaloo over my arrival.
sentences.cn: 人声鼎沸的欢迎场面把我吓了一跳。

sentences.en: She looked up to see what all the hullabaloo was about.
sentences.cn: 她抬起头想看看是什么事这么吵闹。

sentences.en: There are many people who " the moment they alight from the official carriage " make a hullabaloo.
sentences.cn: 有许多人 “ 下车伊始 ”,就哇喇哇喇地发议论.

sentences.en: There was a hullabaloo about it.
They like to live in the countryside, far way from crowd and hullabaloo.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢住在乡村, 远离人群和喧嚣.

words.tran_cn: 喧嚣；吵闹声；吵吵喊喊的争论（等于hullaballoo）

trans.tran_en: a lot of noise, especially made by people shouting
